title: Tim Farron – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Liz Truss (II)
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Tim Farron, the Liberal Democrat MP for Westmorland and Lonsdale, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
Liz Truss was the shortest serving PM in our history, but her disastrous legacy will continue to devastate our country a long time to come.
